REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes the governor to appoint a lieutenant-governor subject to confirmation by the legislature
Summary: Authorizes the governor to appoint a lieutenant-governor subject to confirmation by the legislature.
LawCode: Amd ยง43, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to the appointment of a lieutenant-governor
